document.id: County of San Mateo, Cal., Ord. No. 04819
document.heading:
AN ORDINANCE ADDING A NEW CHAPTER 4.95 TO TITLE 4 OF THE SAN MATEO COUNTY ORDINANCE CODE TO PROHIBIT THE SALE OR DISTRIBUTION OF
ELECTRONIC CIGARETTES

citations.citation: County of San Mateo, Cal., Ord. No. 04819

codify:insert.doc: San Mateo County, Cal., Ordinance Code

container.heading: SALE OR DISTRIBUTION OF ELECTRONIC CIGARETTES

section.heading: Application of chapter.
section.text: The provisions of this chapter shall apply within the unincorporated area of San Mateo County, except that this chapter shall not apply to the duty-free retail stores at San Francisco International Airport.

annotation.doc: County of San Mateo, Cal., Ord. No. 04819

section.heading: Definitions.
section.text: For the purposes of this chapter, the following definitions shall govern unless the context clearly requires otherwise:

para.text: "Distribute" or "Distribution" means the transfer by any Person other than a common carrier, at any point from the place of manufacture or thereafter to a Person who sells the electronic cigarette or other electronic smoking device.
"Electronic Cigarette" has the meaning set forth in Section 30121 of the California Revenue and Taxation Code, as may be amended from time to time.
"Person" means any individual, partnership, cooperative association, private corporation, or any other legal entity.

"Tobacco Retailer" means any store, stand, booth, concession or other enterprise that engages in the retail sale or exchange of tobacco products (as defined in subsection (h) of Section 4.96.030 of this Code), electronic cigarettes, or electronic smoking devices.

"Sell", "Sale" or "to Sell" mean any transaction where, for any consideration, ownership is transferred from one (1) Person or entity to another including, but not limited to any transfer of title or possession for consideration, exchange or barter, in any manner or by any means.

annotation.doc: County of San Mateo, Cal., Ord. No. 04819

section.heading: Sale or distribution of electronic cigarettes prohibited.
section.text: No Person, Tobacco Retailer or other legal entity shall sell or distribute any Electronic Cigarette to a Person in unincorporated San Mateo County.

annotation.doc: County of San Mateo, Cal., Ord. No. 04819

para.text: The Health System Chief, or his or her designee, may enforce this Chapter by suspension of a tobacco retailer's permit and/or imposition of administrative fines following the procedures and amounts set forth in Sections 4.98.150 and 4.98.160 of Chapter 4.98 of this Ordinance Code.
Violations of this chapter may be criminally prosecuted as infraction(s) or misdemeanor(s) at the discretion of the prosecuting attorney as the interests of justice require.
This section shall not be interpreted to limit the applicable civil or administrative remedies available under law.
The Health System Chief may adopt administrative rules, regulations, or guidelines for the implementation and enforcement of this chapter.

annotation.doc: County of San Mateo, Cal., Ord. No. 04819

section.heading: Public nuisance.
section.text: Any violation of this chapter is hereby declared a public nuisance.

annotation.doc: County of San Mateo, Cal., Ord. No. 04819

codify:replace.doc: San Mateo County, Cal., Ordinance Code

section.heading: Residential rates.
section.text: Sewer service charges are hereby prescribed for each residential unit or residential unit equivalent per connection to each district's sanitary sewerage system, per year or portion thereof, as follows:

section.heading: Reserved.
section.text: Editor's note— Ord. No. 04813, § 1, passed July 9, 2019, rescinded § 7.48.100, which pertained to County Bridge No. 67 - Crystal Springs Dam Bridge and derived from Ord. No. 04143, 10-29-02.
